Generalized Correlation Analysis Between Exposures and Features

run_correlation.Rd

Performs correlation analysis between exposures and a selected feature set (DEGs, omics, latent factors, or exposures).

Usage

run_correlation(
  expomicset,
  feature_type = c("degs", "omics", "factors", "factor_features", "exposures"),
  exposure_cols = NULL,
  variable_map = NULL,
  robust = FALSE,
  score_col = "stability_score",
  score_thresh = NULL,
  correlation_method = "spearman",
  correlation_cutoff = 0.3,
  cor_pval_column = "p.value",
  pval_cutoff = 0.05,
  deg_pval_col = "adj.P.Val",
  deg_logfc_col = "logFC",
  deg_pval_thresh = 0.05,
  deg_logfc_thresh = log2(1.5),
  batch_size = 1500,
  action = c("add", "get")
)

Arguments

expomicset

A MultiAssayExperiment object.

feature_type

One of "degs", "omics", "factors", "factor_features", or "exposures".

exposure_cols

Optional character vector of exposure variable names. If NULL, all numeric exposures are used.

variable_map

Optional variable mapping table (only for omics).

robust

If TRUE and feature_type == "degs", restrict to stable DEGs.

score_col

Column name for stability scores in sensitivity analysis.

score_thresh

Optional numeric threshold for feature stability scores.

correlation_method

Correlation method ("spearman", "pearson", etc.).

correlation_cutoff

Threshold for absolute correlation.

cor_pval_column

Which p-value column to apply cutoff to.

pval_cutoff

Significance threshold for p-values.

deg_pval_col

DEG p-value column name.

deg_logfc_col

DEG logFC column name.

deg_pval_thresh

DEG p-value filter threshold.

deg_logfc_thresh

DEG logFC filter threshold.

batch_size

Features per correlation batch.

action

Either "get" (return table) or "add" (update metadata).

Value

If action = "add", returns modified MultiAssayExperiment. Else, returns correlation result table.
